alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 1:59PM MST until December 24 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 7500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow showers, locally heavy at times through this evening. Showers becoming more sporadic overnight. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, with storm totals of 1-2 feet above 8000 feet. Southwest winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 7500 feet near Jacob Lake. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible at times. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Additional snow forecast from 1 PM Today to 11 PM Today: Jacob Lake 1 to 3 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
